results.title: Handicrafts of India
results.creator_credit: Documentary Films of India, Ezra Mir and Krishna Gopal
results.brief_description: Deals with the woodcarving, papiermache and shawl-weaving of Kashmir, the metalwork of Uttar-Pradesh, and the marble modelling of Jaipur.

results.title: Handicrafts instructional films. No. 4. Loom weaving
results.brief_description: In this film we are able to observe one of the students of the Universal School of Handicrafts, USA, threading a small loom, and, following a weaving draft, weaving a pattern.

results.title: Handicap is something you put on a horse
results.creator_credit: I E A, Joan Reidy, Marjorie Fisher and Peter Brighton
results.brief_description: A documentation of the successful integration of a physically disabled person into the field of journalism. Stresses the importance of commencing the integration pocess at an early age and mantaining the integrated contact as the dissabled person matures.

results.title: Handel Messiah: the 250th anniversary performance. For ever and ever
results.creator_credit: Planet 24, Channel 4, Radio-Telefis Eireann (RTE), Victor Vasarely, Tony Boland, Barrie Gavin and Keith Cheetham
results.brief_description: Filmed at the Point Theatre Dublin to mark the 250th anniversary of the premiere of Handel’s great work “The Messiah.” Conducted by Neville Marriner, the Academy of St. Martin-in-the-Fields orchestra and chorus perform the work with solos by Sylvia Mcnair, Anne Sofie von Otter, Michael Chance, Jerry Hadley and Robert Lloyd. There is a documentary entitled “For ever and ever” at the end of the performance which looks at Handel’s Messiah and its history.
results.title_for_label: Handel Messiah: the 250th anniversary performance. For ever and ever

results.title: Handel and his music
results.brief_description: Presents the life story and musical works of George Frideric Handel. Explores the social and political conditions of the period. Explains the musical forms used and developed by Handel - the oratorio, masque opera, suite and baroque. Excerpts from the following are included in the film: Julius Caesar; Water Music; Concerto Grosso No. 6; Italian Cantata No. 17; Messiah - “I know that my redeemer liveth” and ” Hallelujah chorus”.

results.title: Hand tools - scraping tools: down to earth
results.brief_description: Produced with the co-operation of the Association of State Foresters. Explains and demonstrates the tools that are used in combating forest fires. With George Wallace as your friendly training officer.

results.title: Hand tools
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Safetycare”.
This program demonstrates the correct usage of basic handtools and the safety procedures to remember when working with these tools. Discusses spanners, wrenches, pliers, hammers and hacksaws, showing the correct use and maintenance for maximum working condition.

results.title: Hand sawing
results.brief_description: The fundamentals of handling hand saws and choosing the right saw for the job. Outlines the manufacture of saws from primitive times to those made with high-grade ateel today.

results.title: Hand puppets
results.creator_credit: Peking Television, Shanghai Animation Film Studio, Yu Cheh-kuang and Chang Chao-chun
results.brief_description: Costumed hand and glove puppets of Yang Sheng, master puppeteer. Sheng spends long hours of study to create each character and these are brought to life by his superb technique and artistry. Using traditional and legendary Chinese characters and stories, Sheng is training a new generation of young people who demonstrate the production of a traditional play: “A Robe and a Beauty”, performed in full. Suitable for primary and secondary levels.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Peking Television, Shanghai Animation Film Studio, Yu Cheh-kuang and Chang Chao-chun

results.title: Hand painted strip slide magic lantern with chimney
results.brief_description:
Hand painted strip slide magic lantern projector with chimney, and one set of hand painted glass slides (in restored condition).
Strip slide is a single sheet of glass with hand painting directly on to glass. Slide has a wooden frame (stable condition)
1 x Box containing projector
1 x Package containing glass slide (VERY FRAGILE)
